name: Crystal Castle (kylazaur)
description:
Choose your hero, kill all bad guys, don’t forget to pick up the crystal and prepare yourself for an epic boss battle!

Your life is currency - Theme Interpretation: Shoot the bad guys with a spew of coins, protectors of the crystal. Don’t get too crazy though, as without coin you have no way of paying for a ride home after a long adventure of monster slaying!

Controls:

  • Movement: W,A,S,D
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Misc:

  • Fullscreen Mode: Hold ‘F’
  • Restart the game: Hold ‘R’
  • Exit the game: Hold ‘Esc’
